Talk_24:

Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease>Phew...my jaw's sore from all the chatting
I did today. And I'm sure I'll do it all over
again tomorrow when I run into Nikki.<sp:5:0:0>
Ah, my family runs the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>.
If you want to buy something, it's my
husband you should be talking to.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Oh...that Cece hat... Don't you think it
would look so much better on me?
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Ease>Of course it has to rain as soon as I get
all dressed up!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I can't let this Cece-brand outfit get dirty,
or I'll be a laughingstock among the other
Cece fans!<sp:0:4:0>No time to talk! If I don't get out of this
rain, there'll be a fashion disaster!
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>What's going on, you ask?<sp:0:4:0>It looks like there's a new posting on the
<clr:0000>bulletin board<clr:ffff>, so we're hurrying over.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease>Phew...whenever I start chatting with
Nikki, I lose all sense of time.<sp:0:4:0>My family runs the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>. If you
want to buy something, it's my husband
you should be talking to.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ugh. Why are you talking to me this
early in the morning?
SagonoHat: I was gonna get that hat.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ugh. Why are you talking to me this
late at night? I should be getting my
beauty rest.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble>I'm sorry, but can whatever this is wait?<sp:5:0:0>
It's getting time to put my kids to bed.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>Why does it have to rain all the time?!
My favorite clothes are gonna get soaked!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Is this your first time here? Then welcome
to Hateno Village, otherwise known as
<clr:0000>fashion<clr:ffff> central!
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>I have places to be, but if you intend on
rambling around the village, be sure to
get a look at the sculptures.<sp:0:4:0>This is the only place in the world where
you can see <clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff> fine art!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Thanks to <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>, the whole village is so
stylish now.<sp:0:4:0>Just take a look at this hat! It's a limited-
edition piece, you know.
